website_summaries.verdict: Thanks to its all-natural composition, this is the best solution for anyone who is sensitive to overpowering chemical-based air fresheners or has young children and pets. .
pros: Safe for use around pets and children
Many scents available, such as vanilla cinnamon and patchouli sandalwood
Effective at neutralizing strong odors, such as from pets or smoke
cons: We like this plant-derived and fresh-smelling formula, but these air fresheners won't maintain as long as chemically-based competitors

customer_reviews.title: It does its job, but.....
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to give this 3 stars, but the product does smell really good and does its job so I'm willing to give it 4. It definitely neutralizes and deodorizes, but the smell itself doesn't last long. I wouldn't be able to use it as a room scent as it only lasts for about 5 min and then it's like it was never there. Just wish it lasted longer. I would still buy this in the future because it does do what it says it does.
customer_reviews.author: Lulu Bear

customer_reviews.title: so this is perfect for me
customer_reviews.text: I bought this a little over a month ago, and we are still on the first bottle. We use it in our bathroom. I cannot use any fragrances anymore, it gives me severe headaches, so this is perfect for me, it doesn't bug me at all and smells great!! You only need to spray it once or twice too, so it lasts a lot longer than those harsh, toxic chemical perfumed air fresheners. I highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Mattson

customer_reviews.title: Really expensive scentless water
customer_reviews.text: This product is nothing but really expensive water. It has no scent and does nothing for odors. What a waste of $17. I definitely WILL NOT be purchasing this product again. I don't enjoy being ripped off.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Chandler

customer_reviews.title: don't really like the smell
customer_reviews.text: Was really excited to try this essential oil-based room spray but, personally, don't really like the smell. It doesn't really smell like either of the two base notes (cinnamon, vanilla) and is instead a kind of overpowering mixture that has its own character. Definitely would have benefited from having smelled this in a store before buying.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Natural Essential Oil Air Freshener Home Spr2PK Vanilla Cinnamon)
customer_reviews.text: The scent and longevity is very good. It has an exotic aroma which if used on fabric lasts for weeks. Essential oils for this product must be of high quality. It's a good product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: GaryWW

customer_reviews.title: Horrible smell!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the scent “spa bora bora” and it is terrible. I despise the smell of incense and that is exactly what this smells like. The seller reached out to me and when I explained I didn’t like the product their response was “scents can be subjective”. Wrong, this product is trash and the smell matches.
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: Nice scent
customer_reviews.text: Like the scent. The Madagascar Cookie Vanilla Cinnamon actually smells like cookies. I also use it as a body spray and to spray on my clothes. The scent lasts a very long time on clothing. I like that it is made with essential oils, is non-toxic, hypoallergenic, phthalate-free, eco friendly, and has no artificial perfume or fragrances. Great alternative to Air Wick, Glade, Febreze air fresheners and their hazardous ingredients
customer_reviews.author: Bruce L

customer_reviews.title: Great smell and easy to pump
customer_reviews.text: I was tired of using gross cheap air fresheners so I gave this one a go and I’m really happy with it! Reason for the 4 stars- price. Smell is great, bottle and packaging is great! I’m not embarrassed about leaving this out. Fresh smell and 2 pumps lifts the whole room.
customer_reviews.author: M&S

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful scent
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful subtle scent the leaves the room smelling fresh for a long while.
customer_reviews.author: Polo

customer_reviews.title: Don't bother
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn't purchase this again, it's basically water with maybe a drop or two of scent
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Surpases all expectations
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased citrus based oil freshener elsewhere in the past. The odor was way too intense and it left a residue. Your product Madagascar Cookie ( vanilla cinnamon) surpases all expectations! No residue, pleasant scent that doesnt overwhelm and lasts surprisingly long. My only concern is how long a bottle will last as I now use it not just in the bathroom, but throughout the house. I guess I will find out as I deal with my new addiction Thank you for the superior product and for your amazing customer service. Vicki
customer_reviews.author: Vicki J Bergstrom

customer_reviews.title: Best air freshener around, and better still it's all natural
customer_reviews.text: Freshens the room better than any product I've ever found, nice gentle fragrance not overpowering. Love this product I'm buying more just now
customer_reviews.author: Nula

customer_reviews.title: Sweet!!
customer_reviews.text: Finding a nice fragrance that doesn't smell to flowery is not easy. Some smell like after shave lotion, some like a pine forest. This Madagascar Cookie fragrance is nice! It is vanilla and cinnamon. It is a light scent that really helps where it is needed. Even my very picky husband approves!
customer_reviews.author: Quilter

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Scent
customer_reviews.text: The Patchouli Sandalwood scent is beautiful. Very unique and earthy. It works great in the bathroom or for when cooking orders get throughout the house. A small spray goes a long way. Absolutely love it and plan on purchasing more.
customer_reviews.author: PaulaG

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: Had to rerun it smelled bad and I guess Im lucky it didn’t last long but if it had a better smell and didn’t last long I’d still return it too expensive to be a fail
customer_reviews.author: brooke

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting scent, cigar smelling scent
customer_reviews.text: The scent smells like a cigar smell to me. My hubby kept asking me what is that smell. I sprayed it again, and he said that's the smell. So i guess it last a long time. He likes the scent. We both are non smokers. I actually bought for work, can't wait for the reponse on the scent.
customer_reviews.author: LOVE TO SHOP

customer_reviews.title: Best and longest lasting air freshener found!!!
customer_reviews.text: There isn't anything we didn't like about this air freshener. It was the best and longest lasting air freshener we could find anywhere. We only need to spray every few days in the living areas and its amazing in the restrooms. My wife has recommended it to friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: Natal Costa

customer_reviews.title: Delicious
customer_reviews.text: I originally purchased this product for the oral surgery office I work for, and upon discovering how delicious it smelled, I had to get some for myself. This spray smells so good! It’s light enough that spraying it around the office is not offensive to others, and strong enough that it lingers giving yummy whiffs throughout the day. I would definitely recommend this product for work and home!
customer_reviews.author: Beatrice Weaver

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I truly love this product. I discovered it while reading an article on favorite cleaning items. This product exceeds my expectations. A natural way to make the house smell amazing
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Best-smelling scent around!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely fantastic smell! Not overpowering at all, and I get tons of compliments from my Air BnB guests. I realize that it's an airborne product, and as such just wish there was a way the scent could linger a bit longer. Other than that, best smelling air freshener and room neutralizing scent out there!
customer_reviews.author: David P.

customer_reviews.title: Great natural air freshener
customer_reviews.text: This product is fabulous! Same super fast and packaged correctly so there was no damage. The spray smells like snickerdoodle cookies. It eliminates bathroom doors well and I feel safe letting my kids use it in their bathroom. Only takes 1 spray to primate odors!
customer_reviews.author: Bree

customer_reviews.title: Beware Spray Nozzle
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased this numerous times. I'm glad they fixed their sprayer nozzles. Made a mess when trying to dispense product. Overall, good though, nice aroma. I love the Patchouli Sandalwood.
customer_reviews.author: Curt Baker

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't smell as expected
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact it's non toxic and not made with any chemicals. However, the Sandalwood scent which I bought doesn't smell much like it and the scent itself only lasts about 2 minutes, if that much. Only tested in my car so I'm guessing it won't work that well in bigger spaces. It smells good overall but not exactly what I was expecting. I really bought it hoping for a strong sandalwood scent.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Let down
customer_reviews.text: Not what I expected scent doesn’t last and doesn’t smell that good like the reviews say
customer_reviews.author: It'smeyakno

customer_reviews.title: Smells amazing and LASTS!
customer_reviews.text: This is the 3rd pair of these we have used in our home. We absolutely love it! Takes a long time to run out as only one pump is needed. The smell is amazing and it lasts! They are an essential in our bathroom. Don’t mind the word “cookie” in the title. It translates to “smells divine”!
customer_reviews.author: Fairedawn

customer_reviews.title: wish i could say i love it
customer_reviews.text: i was imagining more spice like holiday time this is very long lasting but not for me a vanilla plastic smell i had to toss it...
customer_reviews.author: louise kahle

customer_reviews.title: It does really work!
customer_reviews.text: I am skeptical of all the air fresheners out there but I thought I will give Best Natural Essential Oil Air Freshener Home Spray a try. I am glad that I did. The scent is fabulous as well as the job that It does! The product removes dog and smoke smell completely and leaves a pleasant scent in its place. I will recommend over and over again. There are 3 different scents and I plan to try all! Great buy!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A lot more cinnamon than vanilla, and doesn't cover every smell
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice scent if you like cinnamon. I was hoping for more of a balance between the vanilla and cinnamon, though. It would probably work well to spritz up a room, but does not work to cover up bathroom smells. You'll just get the cinnamon along with the bathroom smell. Bummer, since I was hoping to find a good natural deodorizer that's not a citrus scent.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Smells good without being toxic
customer_reviews.text: Smells good without being toxic! Never causes my dog or my husband or me any irritation. Really love that these are natural and not harmful. Make my home smell so good when needed. Will be back to purchase more in the future!
customer_reviews.author: Misty Heagney

customer_reviews.title: Our Favorite Room Spray!
customer_reviews.text: We love, love, love this room spray! I was hesitant that I could find a product that was all natural that could take away the unpleasant odor left behind, but it does its job! We have purchased some of the other scents as well and they are just as good, but the Spa Bora Bora is our favorite!
customer_reviews.author: Megan W.

customer_reviews.title: Smells Great
customer_reviews.text: This smells great and works wonderful. My daughter liked it so much she sprays it in for cologne.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: PERVASIVE VANILLA SMELL
customer_reviews.text: It works pretty good, but there’s hardly any cinnamon scent, and that’s what I wanted. Don’t spray too much! It lingers awhile!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan
customer_reviews.text: I'm sorry but I don't like the scent. I love patchouli and sandalwood but this smells nothing like either.The scent lasts a couple of minutes, that's all. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Kirasheba

customer_reviews.title: First time trying this out, so far so good.
customer_reviews.text: I like that the spray from this freshener (it is not a dry spray but is not wet either). The scent is really nice and does seem to take care of bathroom odors well.
customer_reviews.author: Online Customer

customer_reviews.title: Spray Air Refreshener is in a very convent size
customer_reviews.text: Patchouli Sandalwood Essential Oils spay has a very nice aroma. I plan on getting some of the other sprays and trying them.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Carico

customer_reviews.title: Very effective bathroom odor eliminator!
customer_reviews.text: This product is quite effective as a bathroom deodorizer and I will be buying again. The scent is complex but not overpowering. Only downside is I wish the great scent was longer lasting. It dissipates in a few minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Irish in Oklahoma

customer_reviews.title: Right purchase smells great
customer_reviews.text: Smells great I have it in every bathroom and I know the scent isn’t bad forFor my cats and it was a really good purchase

customer_reviews.title: Smelled terrible!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Vanilla Cinnamon scent and it smelled nothing like vanilla or cinnamon...returned!

customer_reviews.title: no aerosol
customer_reviews.text: smells really nice and does the job. much less nasty to your nose than those aerosol air fresheners. a bit costly but let's see how long the bottle lasts, that's my reason for 4 stars versus 5. I'm not a fan of cinnamon or vanilla but together they are pretty decent and almost neutral.
customer_reviews.author: lydiap

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan
customer_reviews.text: Not a fan of this fragrance was trying something different. I'll stick with citrus and scents like that which aren't overbearing.
customer_reviews.author: Satessia Favors

customer_reviews.title: Smooth and enjoyable scent
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied with this scent. Smell is not overwhelming at all in the other hand is nice and smooth. Using it to scent my face mask thought.

customer_reviews.title: We love it.
customer_reviews.text: I love the scent and it lasts a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Merrymom

customer_reviews.title: Unpleasant scent
customer_reviews.text: Did not like this scent at all. Used it in a bathroom and it did not smell good and even had to leave the fan on for 2 days to try to remove the smell. If you want something that lasts a long time, this is it!!
customer_reviews.author: M. S.

customer_reviews.title: Love the scent.
customer_reviews.text: Love this product, but wish it were cheaper...when I started buying it, it was affordable, but now it's gone up $2 in the last year. I also wish the scent lasted longer.
customer_reviews.author: Tracie

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Buy This
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely the worst, almost no smell of cinnamon. I bought this for my grandmother, and regret spending the outrageous amount of money for this terrible product. The overwhelming smell of vanilla lasts not even an hour, which was good because it was sickening. I will not purchase this again, and advise you not to either.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Monahan

customer_reviews.title: It smells really good !
customer_reviews.text: It smells really good and last awhile. It's not a strong smell its very light.

customer_reviews.title: Nice smell.
customer_reviews.text: Great smell but doesn’t last very long unless you use tons!

customer_reviews.title: Nice scent - love this product
customer_reviews.text: I’m pretty picky when it comes to room scents, so I was a little nervous about ordering online, but I’m glad I did. This product has a nice scent that isn’t overwhelming or ‘fake’ smelling.
customer_reviews.author: Danna

customer_reviews.title: A great natural fragrance
customer_reviews.text: A great natural fragrance unlike other popular brands that are too strong and fake smelling. I wish the spray bottle was twice as big! I will buy this product again and recommend it to others with a sensitive nose.
customer_reviews.author: JCCruise

customer_reviews.title: Nice scent, bottle half full
customer_reviews.text: In one of the bottle sprays, the spray cap was not tighten enough so half of the liquid spilled during shipping. This is the reason for my 3 star rating, otherwise it would have been a 4 or 5.
customer_reviews.author: Sigi Paez

customer_reviews.title: Purely awesome
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love it. It smells great. Does not choke you in a cloud of aerosol gas. Best air refreshener on the market and I am serious!

customer_reviews.title: Smells Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Heavy cinnamon with sweet vanilla tones. Wish it was an aerosol, otherwise perfection

customer_reviews.title: Vanilla air spray excellent !
customer_reviews.text: This vanilla air freshener spray is lovely! Smells like natural vanilla, works well on odors, just i little spray does it.

customer_reviews.title: Smells like cookies

customer_reviews.title: Smells nice, but Spray top leaks a lot
customer_reviews.text: Smells nice, but it doesn’t spray well. The liquid leaks all over when the top is pushed down to spray.

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: This was not a good product. This smell did not last at all. On about 5 sec.

customer_reviews.title: Really nice and pleasant smell.
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived on time. It was what I hoped it would be: just the right amount of cinnamon and vanilla. It leaves a nice smell, especially when our 2 year old grandson dirties his diaper and leaves a ripe smell. I would and will buy this product again.

customer_reviews.title: Effective and natural! Head and shoulders above widely available commercial products!
customer_reviews.text: Would like to have larger volume of product for the price.

customer_reviews.title: Fresh air without the phony scent
customer_reviews.text: This product is very effective, requiring very little to eliminate odors and freshen a room. The fragrance is soft and natural. I think I have finally found the perfect air freshener, and will certainly continue as a customer.

customer_reviews.title: No cats here!
customer_reviews.text: This smells great. Covers up the litter box smell in my basement :)

customer_reviews.title: Fab scent.

customer_reviews.text: Not nearly as effective as an odor eliminator. Would be better defined as a short lived fragrance

customer_reviews.title: Changed their recipe????
customer_reviews.text: For 2yrs this has been my favorite air freshener. In that time, I’ve bought 6 bottles. I returned my latest order because it smelled like cheap men’s cologne and nothing like all my previous bottles. I compared them to what’s left of my previous bottles. I got a replacement that smells just as bad so I will return those too. My guess is they changed their recipe. Too bad because the new version is nothing like the original.

customer_reviews.title: Great scent!
customer_reviews.text: I stumbled upon this searching for Cruelty-Free air fresheners. So glad that I did. The scent smells so good and you only need a spray or two, which has made this a long-lasting product for me. Wonderful vanilla scent with a hint of cinnamon. I’ve purchased this a few times!

product_meta.title: BEST Natural Essential Oil Air Freshener Home Spray (2PK Vanilla Cinnamon) | Room Odor Eliminator Spray | Neutralize Bathroom Toilet Odors
feature_bullets: ESSENTIAL OIL AIR FRESHENER: Organic air freshener. Sweet and warm Vanilla & Cinnamon air freshener, plant based natural essentials oils blend. Natural air freshener spray and natural bathroom spray.

VERY SAFE: Non-toxic to children, pets and the environment. Not just a bathroom spray air freshener. Safe to use even as a body spray. Bio-degradable, no artificial perfume or fragrances. No animal by-products or synthetic colors or contaminants. Hypoallegenic, Phthalate free, vegan, Eco-friendly natural air freshener spray.

VERY EFFECTIVE: Specially formulated odor eliminator and essential oil Spray. It absorbs, neutralize and dissolve or eliminate odors naturally instead of masking like chemicals and synthetics like most big box names. Sweet warm scent of Vanilla and Cinnamon to soothe and relax.
MADE IN TEXAS: Anti odor eco friendly air freshners. Use in rooms, linens, pet bedding, shoes, car, garage, bathroom, curtain, fabric, upholstery for that spa bora bora clean scent.
NOTE: Up to 200 sprays. Spraying in big open or windy spaces will cause the scent to thin out quickly. For best results, spray appropriate amount in sweeping motion based on area and condition.
